title: Bubble Level For Android Wear
summary: A bubble level for your Android Wear smartwatch.
developerAddress:
Wearable Software
Cedric Larrat
Grötzingerstr. 73
76227 Karlsruhe-Durlach
description: A spirit level, bubble level or simply a level (clinometer) for your smartwatch. Hold any of the watches four sides against an object to test it for level or plumb, or lay it down on a flat surface for a 360° level. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start bubble level.Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsFeatures- Calibration for less precise devices- Specially designed for Android Wear watches- No adsPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Bubble Level" or say "Start bubble level"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
A spirit level, bubble level or simply a level (clinometer) for your smartwatch. Hold any of the watches four sides against an object to test it for level or plumb, or lay it down on a flat surface for a 360° level. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start bubble level.


Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features
- Calibration for less precise devices
- Specially designed for Android Wear watches
- No ads


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Bubble Level" or say "Start bubble level"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Possibly malicious App had not been launched on fresh install and it used 16mb of data. The app isn't even that big itself.
